svg.content: <mxfile host="Electron" modified="2023-09-05T10:52:45.691Z" agent="Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) draw.io/21.6.8 Chrome/114.0.5735.289 Electron/25.5.0 Safari/537.36" etag="MNvfVwmzE8QjZcqHeqzc" version="21.6.8" type="device"> <diagram id="lpFk9_yJqk29wEnTEv91" name="Seite-1"> <mxGraphModel dx="2643" dy="577" grid="1" gridSize="10" guides="1" tooltips="1" connect="1" arrows="1" fold="1" page="1" pageScale="1" pageWidth="827" pageHeight="1169" math="0" shadow="0"> <root> <mxCell id="0" /> <mxCell id="1" parent="0" /> <mxCell id="XbCPmlK9kbh3xRhZAAFj-1" value="<p style="text-align: center ; margin: 4px 0px 0px">«interface»<br></p><p style="text-align: center ; margin: 4px 0px 0px"><b>Authentifizierungsmanager</b></p><hr><p style="margin: 0px 0px 0px 8px">+&nbsp;authentifiziere(oauth2ClientRegistrationId: String): void</p><p style="margin: 0px 0px 0px 8px">+&nbsp;authentifiziereClient(issuerLocation: URI,&nbsp;<span style="background-color: initial;">clientID: String, clientSecret: String): void</span></p><p style="border-color: var(--border-color); margin: 0px 0px 0px 8px;">+&nbsp;authentifiziereClient(issuerLocation: URI,&nbsp;clientID: String, clientSecret: String, bhknz: String): void</p><p style="margin: 0px 0px 0px 8px">+&nbsp;authentifiziereSystem(issuerLocation: URI, clientID: String, clientSecret: String, username: String, password: String): void</p><p style="border-color: var(--border-color); margin: 0px 0px 0px 8px;"><span style="background-color: initial;">+&nbsp;authentifiziereSystem(issuerLocation: URI, clientID: String, clientSecret: String, username: String, password: String, bhknz: String): void</span><br></p>" style="verticalAlign=top;align=left;overflow=fill;fontSize=12;fontFamily=Helvetica;html=1;fillColor=#FFCC99;labelBackgroundColor=none;fontColor=#000000;strokeColor=default;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="-920" y="360" width="750" height="130" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="XbCPmlK9kbh3xRhZAAFj-3" value="<p style="text-align: center ; margin: 4px 0px 0px">«interface»<br></p><p style="text-align: center ; margin: 4px 0px 0px"><b>Security</b></p><hr><p style="margin: 0px 0px 0px 8px">+ getAlleRollen(): Set&lt;String&gt;<br>+ getAuthentifizierungsmanager(): Authentifizierungsmanager<br>+ getBerechtigungsmanager(): Berechtigungsmanager&nbsp;</p>" style="verticalAlign=top;align=left;overflow=fill;fontSize=12;fontFamily=Helvetica;html=1;fillColor=#FFCC99;labelBackgroundColor=none;fontColor=#000000;strokeColor=default;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="-920" y="240" width="750" height="100" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="DSZoqKW3aHyUluvnvp3w-2" value="<p style="text-align: center ; margin: 4px 0px 0px">«interface»<br></p><p style="text-align: center ; margin: 4px 0px 0px"><b>Berechtigungsmanager</b></p><hr><p style="margin: 0px 0px 0px 8px;">+ getRechte: Set&lt;String&gt;</p><p style="margin: 0px 0px 0px 8px;">+ getRollen(): Set&lt;String&gt;&nbsp;<br>+ hatRecht(recht: String): boolean<br></p><p style="margin: 0px 0px 0px 8px;">+ pruefeRecht(recht: String): void<br></p><p style="margin: 0px 0px 0px 8px;">+ getTokenAttribute(key: String): Object</p>" style="verticalAlign=top;align=left;overflow=fill;fontSize=12;fontFamily=Helvetica;html=1;fillColor=#FFCC99;labelBackgroundColor=none;fontColor=#000000;strokeColor=default;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="-920" y="510" width="750" height="130" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="1QDjDjm3P5Nb9N2zG3x--1" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;exitX=0.5;exitY=1;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;strokeColor=#576164;strokeWidth=2;endArrow=blockThin;" parent="1" source="XbCPmlK9kbh3xRhZAAFj-3" target="XbCPmlK9kbh3xRhZAAFj-3" edge="1"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> </root> </mxGraphModel> </diagram> </mxfile>

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 752px; height: 130px; padding-top: 120px; margin-left: 0px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: left; width: 750px; height: 130px; overflow: hidden;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; width: 100%; height: 100%; white-space: nowrap;
